summary: Creaking Hearts do not have a unique place sound
Creakings can attack players in the same team as them
Creakings on a team can still be observed and stopped by teammate players
Baby cats and ocelots size is changed
Chunks on the corner of the rendering distance are not synchronized between client and server for the terrain
Creakings activate for a brief moment when switching from Creative to Spectator mode
Arrows and tridents glitch after shooting/throwing them onto magma/soul sand blocks underwater
Tridents glitch up and down in rising bubble columns
Arrows are not correctly affected by rising bubble columns
Arrows and tridents glitch when in an explosion or wind charge burst
The base damage of the Power enchantment was reduced in 1.21
Creaking Heart has inconsistent and miscolored pixels
Arrows summoned with custom motion don't render correctly
When grass or mycelium grows under powder snow the grass is not snowy
Most empty slot icons ignore "scaling" parameter in mcmeta files
There are no shadows on placeholder text displayed within the "Please describe what happened" box within the reporting menu
There are no shadows on text used to display the names of game rules within the game rules menu
The "Layer Material" and "Height" text within the "Superflat Customization" menu is positioned too close to the header separator
There are no shadows on text used to display the description of advancements within the advancements menu
There are no shadows on text used to display the names of text boxes within the realms settings menu
There are no shadows on text displayed when connecting to realms
There are no shadows on text used to display the start date and time left of your realm subscription within the realms menu
There are no shadows on text used to display the speed at which a world is being uploaded within the realms menu
There are no shadows on text used to display the description of report categories within the "Select Report Category" menu
Evokers run away from creakings faster than other illagers
There are no shadows on text used to display the names of lists within the resource pack and data pack menus
There are no shadows on text used to display the names of categories within the key binds menu
The "message(s) selected" text within the "Select Chat Messages to Report" menu is positioned too close to the header separator
Creakings cannot rotate their heads independently from their bodies
Creakings are able to be pushed around by entities and players when standing on soul sand and mud
Crash upon loading chunks when teleporting
Sniffers can't dig into pale moss
Pufferfish have no hit delay on creakings; they make a loud buzzing noise constantly
The sound event associated with the "Creaking sees player" subtitle doesn't exist
Subtitles for cave sounds, creaking heart idle sounds, and pale hanging moss idle sounds are identical but are shown separately
Differences in the highlight effect of empty slot outlines in the GUI
Music plays in the pale garden
The 2 brightest pixel colors on pale oak boat items are wrong
Pale chest boat item is incorrect
The Creaking "slides" on the ground when not aggro towards the player
You can get soft locked if a creaking falls in a hole with you
Creaking mob can spawn inside block
Pale oak sign item and block texture is inconsistent with the other signs
Destroying a creaking heart with player-activated TNT does not grant the Monster Hunter advancement
Pale oak hanging sign uses a totally different palette to the rest of the wood set
Pale hanging moss doesn't have an assigned tool
You can use bone meal on pale moss carpets in situations where nothing grows
Creakings do not show particles leading to the creaking heart if Particles are set to Minimal
TNT Minecarts with explosion_power set to 0 can still break blocks
There are no shadows on text displayed within the superflat customization or preset lists
There are no shadows on text displayed within the social interactions list menu
The "Can hold a mixed stack of items" text within bundle tooltips doesn't have a shadow
Display entity shadow_radius updates for all display entities
Consumable blocking animation is broken in first person
Decorated Pot is missing the "contents" implicit data component type
Dimension padding doesn't affect the start piece
Empty Offers:{} NBT doesn't disable trades anymore
Advancement box textures use nine-slice scaling, but seemingly cannot be configured
There are no shadows on text displayed within the singleplayer, multiplayer, and realms list menus
The last language option is not deselected if you reach the bottom of the list and exit the menu
Wind Charges don't ignite TNT minecarts
Tutorial hint for movement may not fit all the required text if controls are changed
Text wall when trying to join a server
Nether Brick block texture misalignment
Large bold text can have gaps in the middle of characters
/execute on origin doesn't work on Area Effect Cloud's owner after rejoining
Slots with item outline textures behave inconsistently when items are placed inside of these slots
Nine_sliced sprite glitch
Advancement description text cuts words in weird places if title is too short
/setblock can't place snowy grass blocks
Magma Cube's layers UV mapping overlaps
Inconsistency with blackstone and stone pressure plate drops compared to buttons
No subtitle for item.crossbow.loading_middle
/setblock and /fill resets the instrument block state of note blocks
Cannot setblock a directional state on redstone wire nor tripwire
Cannot setblock chest type other than single without other adjacent chest
Cannot set the in_wall block state of fence gates with /setblock or /fill
Doors' block states cannot be set if another door half exists
/fill and /setblock cannot set different directional block states of several blocks, such as glass panes and iron bars
Cannot set "shape" block state of stairs with /setblock
Fences and walls can no longer be placed in invalid block states by using /setblock or /fill
Advancements menu doesn't render titles fully when they're longer than roughly 30 characters
Ender Dragon doesn't take damage from melee attacks unless hit a certain way
The player continues sprinting when performing actions that slow them down
Blocks at y=-64 don't render on a map
Player flickers/turns invisible when flying at high speeds
Ctrl Pick Block gives new item even if picked item already exists in inventory
The brewing stand GUI does not have container sprites for the fuel and potion output slots
Altering the time of day using commands is delayed
The 'Hat' layer of a player skin is not shown in the tab list under certain conditions
Dark/pale oak leaves sometimes do not generate centered on the tree
Title with long duration shows in other world
Villager trading window is not closed when villager leaves interaction range
The title of written books is not displayed in item frames unless renamed with anvils
Cave carvers don't cut through snow blocks
Flying through climbable blocks in creative mode slows you down
